amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Limited English Proficiency Initiative by $150,000 for a total funding amount of $450,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds for the creation and promotion of translated materials and other programs that support the assistance of persons with limited English proficiency in utilizing the services provided by HUD by $150,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
